title: Ok, priority que, aside from its strictness i have a few issues
body:
So im trying to play a game with a friend but he is in 20 minute priority que. That would be ok if the last game he quit from wasn't a custom game, where everyone was trolling.

Fix this riot, it was a fkkn custom game.

replies.body:
you don't get put in low priority que for quitting customs. he probs afk's a lot.
>That would be ok if the last game he quit from wasn't a custom game
Yeah, pretty sure custom games aren't affected by this (otherwise I would be screwed)
